extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running any of the affected products, including Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Office, SharePoint Server, Windows Defender, and Visual Studio.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-30044?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates to all affected assets to mitigate the vulnerability.
